title: "zed nut op. ur yi. u shud win. u bad." ~Zed
body:
Hummm.... I had no idea Yi was safer than Zed. All I have is MS as an escape.
Zed has his kit and Lulu, Ryze and Noc all using their CC on said Yi. 

Oh I had no _idea_ Yi was safer than Zed. 
Can Yi jump over any wall he pleases? Nah. Needs to be an enemy close enough on the other side. Can Yi burst an entire team from across the lane with a single face-slam on the keyboard? 
Sure, but he'll end up right in the middle of the enemy team, then get CC'd to death by the Ryze, Lulu and Noc.

Zed mains are so delusional.
